description: '''Alexander Nikolaevich Bashlachev''' ({{lang-rus|Алекса́ндр Никола́евич Башлачёв|p=ɐlʲɪˈksandr nʲɪkɐˈlajɪvʲɪtɕ bəʂlɐˈtɕɵf|a=Alyeksandr Nickolayevich Bashlachyov.ru.vorb.oga}}; 27 May 1960 – 17 February 1988) was a [[Soviet people|Soviet]] poet, singer-songwriter and guitarist considered to be one of the most influential performers in [[Russian rock]] music.
